TextureResource(filepath, in_ram)
      Object that holds information about bitmaps. The file needs to be a 16-bit RGB565 .bmp file
Parameters:
      filepath [value: string, type: string]
      in_ram [value: True of False (False by default), type: boolean]
Attributes:
      width [value: any (read-only), type: float]
      height [value: any (read-only), type: float]
      data [value: RGB565 bytearray (note, if in_ram is False, then writing to this is not a valid operation), type: bytearray]

file: src/resources/engine_texture_resource.c

landing
